title: Ep. 110 - Buffett’s Take on the Markets
itunes:title: Buffett’s Take on the Markets
description: Mary Buffett discusses Warren’s stock picking formula in her new book, The Warren Buffett Stock Portfolio.  Co-author David Clark tells us how to invest in panic markets.
content:encoded: Mary Buffett discusses Warren’s stock picking formula in her new book, The Warren Buffett Stock Portfolio.  Co-author David Clark tells us how to invest in panic markets.
